project.name: White-Label Configurable To-Do App
project.objective: Develop a clean, modular To-Do app with a dynamic UI configurable via an API JSON response, demonstrating white-label capabilities like theming and component control.

apiDrivenUIConfiguration.description: Create a mock JSON API response containing app configuration data.

toDoAppFeatures.listView: Display list of to-do items (mock data)
toDoAppFeatures.uiBehavior: Components visibility controlled via JSON config

whiteLabelingAndTheming.dynamicTheming: Apply colors and theme mode from JSON
whiteLabelingAndTheming.modeSwitching: Support light/dark mode toggle via config

dynamicComponentRendering.conditionalRendering: Render components based on JSON config

customDynamicComponents.definition: Support adding custom components with label and action

usage.cubit: For simple UI toggles and configuration states
usage.bloc: For CRUD actions and dynamic UI updates

codeQualityAndExtensibility.architecture: Modular separation of UI, business logic, and config parsing
codeQualityAndExtensibility.extensibility: Allow for easy expansion of white-label features
codeQualityAndExtensibility.documentation: Explain config handling and extension process

deliverables.mockJsonConfig: Example file demonstrating themes and UI toggles
deliverables.flutterSourceCode: App implementing features and BLoC management
deliverables.readme: Guide on API-driven config and white-label extensibility

optional.dynamicAppIdentity: Demonstrate dynamic app name and application ID change

emphasis: Clean separation of concerns with BLoC/Cubit
API-driven theming and component toggling for white-label capability
